FF_FS_EXFAT.Name: FF_FS_EXFAT
FF_FS_EXFAT.Description: This option switches support for exFAT filesystem. (0:Disable or 1:Enable)(Also enable FF_USE_LFN)

FF_MULTI_PARTITION.Name: FF_MULTI_PARTITION
FF_MULTI_PARTITION.Description: This option switches support for multiple volumes on the physical drive.(0:Single partition,1:Enable multiple partion)

FF_MAX_SS.Name: FF_MAX_SS
FF_MAX_SS.Description: The sector size in unit of byte. (512, 1024, 2048, 4096)

FF_FS_MINIMIZE.Name: FF_FS_MINIMIZE
FF_FS_MINIMIZE.Description: This option defines minimization level to remove some basic API functions

FF_VOLUMES.Name: FF_VOLUMES
FF_VOLUMES.Description: Number of volumes (logical drives) to be used. (1-10)

FF_FS_READONLY.Name: FF_FS_READONLY
FF_FS_READONLY.Description: This option switches read-only configuration. (0:Read/Write or 1:Read-only)

FF_FS_RPATH.Name: FF_FS_RPATH
FF_FS_RPATH.Description: 0: Disable relative path and remove related functions. 1: Enable relative path. f_chdir() and f_chdrive() are available. 2: f_getcwd() function is available in addition to 1.

FF_USE_CHMOD.Name: FF_USE_CHMOD
FF_USE_CHMOD.Description: This option switches attribute manipulation functions, f_chmod() and f_utime((0:Disable or 1:Enable)FF_FS_READONLY follows).

FF_USE_MKFS.Name: FF_USE_MKFS
FF_USE_MKFS.Description: This option switches f_mkfs() function. (0:Disable or 1:Enable)

FF_USE_STRFUNC.Name: FF_USE_STRFUNC
FF_USE_STRFUNC.Description: 0: Disable. 1: Enable without LF-CRLF conversion.2: Enable with LF-CRLF conversion.
